PageDescription: Work on all kinds of office documents within Trello using ONLYOFFICE Docs
Subheader: Work on all kinds of office documents within Trello using ONLYOFFICE Docs
WorkWithinConnector: Work on office documents uploaded to Trello board cards
DocumentsTab1Label: Allow admins and members with normal rights to edit DOCX, XLSX, and PPTX files.
DocumentsTab2Label: Grant observers rights to view uploaded documents.
DocumentsTab3Label: Co-author documents with your colleagues in real-time.
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with Trello
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE Power-Up for Trello now from the Atlassian Marketplace.
Reason1: Podpora více než <0>50 formátů souborů</0>, plně kompatibilní s formáty MS Office: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
Reason2: Robustní sada nástrojů pro úpravy, formátování a stylování. Integrovaný <0>AI pomocník.
Reason3: Real-time and paragraph-locking <0>co-editing</0>, review, version history, document comparison, comments & chat.
Reason4: <0>Enhanced security.</0> Flexible access rights and JWT. Watermarking and password protection. Open source code.
Reason5: Seamless integration with ready-to-use connector from the Atlassian Marketplace. <0>Easy configuration</0>.
Reason6: Cloud and self-hosted solution for total control over your data. Scalable Enterprise versions. <0>Free 30-day trial</0>.
HowToStartStep1: Nasaďte <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> na svůj vlastní server nebo si vytvořte účet <1>Docs Cloud</1>.
HowToStartStep2: Get the power-up from the <0>Atlassian Marketplace</0>.
HowToStartStep3: Configure the power-up and enable JWT.
NeedAnAppToConnect: Potřebujete aplikaci pro připojení ONLYOFFICE k vaší oblíbené webové službě? Nebo jste ji již vyvinuli?
